abstract: There are tensions over how to proceed among Republicans, too.
lead_paragraph: Out of public view, Mr. McConnell and his aides were working to complete a resolution that would set the parameters for the first phase of the trial and be put up for a vote on Tuesday. Democrats plan to oppose it en masse because it does not guarantee that witnesses can be called and new evidence admitted, and they will propose amendments during Tuesdayâ€™s debate to try to change that.
